title: Feed 10,000 Families
short_description: Our goal is to provide nutritious meals to 10,000 families in need by the end of the year.

title: Reduce Food Waste
short_description: We aim to reduce food waste by rescuing and redistributing 50,000 pounds of surplus food annually.

title: Support Local Farmers
short_description: We're committed to sourcing fresh produce from local farmers and supporting their livelihoods.

title: Engage Volunteers
short_description: Our goal is to engage 1,000 volunteers to help with food collection and distribution efforts.
